price: Kad se dvojica sastanu i sjednu jedan s desne, a drugi s lijeve strane,
arabic: إِذۡ يَتَلَقَّى ٱلۡمُتَلَقِّيَانِ عَنِ ٱلۡيَمِينِ وَعَنِ ٱلشِّمَالِ قَعِيدٞ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: idh yatalaqqā al-mutalaqiyāni ʿani al-yamīni waʿani al-shimāli qaʿīdun
